div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1523 Latakia (anc. Laodiceia ad Mare), Seleucis, 1940 Burial: c. 290-280 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 9 AR Alexander III: 3 early post. tetradr. (Tyre 1, Babylon 2) Seleucus I: 6 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Tigrim 4, 1 as ESM 4, 3 as ESM 27; Susa 2, as ESM 307, WSM 325 A) Disposition: dispersed Newell, WSM, p. 23
